00006    Copyright (C) 1998-2002 Gilles Vollant

00010 #define _ZLIBIOAPI_H

00013 #define ZLIB_FILEFUNC_SEEK_CUR (1)
00014 #define ZLIB_FILEFUNC_SEEK_END (2)
00015 #define ZLIB_FILEFUNC_SEEK_SET (0)
00016 
00017 #define ZLIB_FILEFUNC_MODE_READ      (1)
00018 #define ZLIB_FILEFUNC_MODE_WRITE     (2)
00019 #define ZLIB_FILEFUNC_MODE_READWRITEFILTER (3)
00020 
00021 #define ZLIB_FILEFUNC_MODE_EXISTING (4)
00022 #define ZLIB_FILEFUNC_MODE_CREATE   (8)

00025 #ifndef ZCALLBACK
00026 
00027 #if (defined(WIN32) || defined (WINDOWS) || defined (_WINDOWS)) && defined(CALLBACK)
00028 #define ZCALLBACK CALLBACK
00029 #else
00030 #define ZCALLBACK
00031 #endif
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 typedef voidpf (ZCALLBACK *open_file_func) OF((voidpf opaque, const char* filename, int mode));
00035 typedef uLong  (ZCALLBACK *read_file_func) OF((voidpf opaque, voidpf stream, void* buf, uLong size));
00036 typedef uLong  (ZCALLBACK *write_file_func) OF((voidpf opaque, voidpf stream, const void* buf, uLong size));
00037 typedef long   (ZCALLBACK *tell_file_func) OF((voidpf opaque, voidpf stream));
00038 typedef long   (ZCALLBACK *seek_file_func) OF((voidpf opaque, voidpf stream, uLong offset, int origin));
00039 typedef long   (ZCALLBACK *close_file_func) OF((voidpf opaque, voidpf stream));
00040 typedef int    (ZCALLBACK *testerror_file_func) OF((voidpf opaque, voidpf stream));
00041 
00042 typedef struct zlib_filefunc_def_s
00043 {
00044     open_file_func      zopen_file;
00045     read_file_func      zread_file;
00046     write_file_func     zwrite_file;
00047     tell_file_func      ztell_file;
00048     seek_file_func      zseek_file;
00049     close_file_func     zclose_file;
00050     testerror_file_func zerror_file;
00051     voidpf              opaque;
00052 } zlib_filefunc_def;
00053

00055 
00056 void fill_fopen_filefunc OF((zlib_filefunc_def* pzlib_filefunc_def));
00057 
00058 #define ZREAD(filefunc,filestream,buf,size) ((*((filefunc).zread_file))((filefunc).opaque,filestream,buf,size))
00059 #define ZWRITE(filefunc,filestream,buf,size) ((*((filefunc).zwrite_file))((filefunc).opaque,filestream,buf,size))
00060 #define ZTELL(filefunc,filestream) ((*((filefunc).ztell_file))((filefunc).opaque,filestream))
00061 #define ZSEEK(filefunc,filestream,pos,mode) ((*((filefunc).zseek_file))((filefunc).opaque,filestream,pos,mode))
00062 #define ZCLOSE(filefunc,filestream) ((*((filefunc).zclose_file))((filefunc).opaque,filestream))
00063 #define ZERROR(filefunc,filestream) ((*((filefunc).zerror_file))((filefunc).opaque,filestream))
00064 #endif
